ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Stage__c), "M6"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, "M6")), NOT( OR( ISPICKVAL(Stage__c,"M5"), ISPICKVAL(Stage__c,"M4"), ISPICKVAL(Stage__c,"M4-"), ISPICKVAL(Stage__c,"M7") ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Invalid next stage from M6. Allowed: M5, M4, M4-, M7.
